name: Dogs of the Drift
description:
Welcome to the Drift, the frozen wasteland of our former world.  You are a “Courier”, a delivery person for hire who transports goods between settlements with the help of your team of sled dogs.

Buy dogs, complete dangerous deliveries across the frozen wasteland, level up your dogs, and buy more gear. Be careful to only take what you need, the heavier the sled, the slower it will go and time is always limited. Manage your dog's fatigue and don't let them become exhausted or they may be forced to retire forever...

How many deliveries can you and your dogs complete?

---

This game was created for the Black and White Jam #⁷√∞ by:

Paul Benoit - Game Design

Tanya Bobrowski - Art

Jonah Kissoon - Music and Sound

Joel Lavigne - Programming

Craig Orser - Game Design
